content:
Scarpetta does have private dining options and areas that can accommodate your group. They have a few private dining rooms and sections that can be reserved for special occasions like birthdays.

Here are some options to consider:

1. **Private Dining Room**: Scarpetta has a private dining room that can seat up to 12 guests. This room is perfect for intimate gatherings and offers a more secluded atmosphere. You can enjoy a customized menu and personalized service in this space.
2. **Wine Room**: The wine room is a semi-private area that can seat up to 10 guests. It's surrounded by wine cellar walls and offers a cozy, exclusive atmosphere. This space is ideal for wine enthusiasts and those who want a more private dining experience.
3. **Banquette Seating**: Scarpetta also offers banquette seating areas that can accommodate larger groups. These areas are located in the main dining room but offer a more private and cozy atmosphere. You can reserve a section of banquettes for your group and enjoy a more secluded celebration.

When you make your reservation, be sure to ask about the private dining options and availability. You can also request a specific area or room based on your preferences.

Additionally, you can discuss with the restaurant about any special arrangements or decorations you'd like to make your birthday celebration even more special. They might be able to accommodate requests like balloons, flowers, or a customized cake.

Remember to confirm the details with the restaurant when you make your reservation, and I'm sure they'll do their best to make your 30th birthday dinner an unforgettable experience!
